exercises.name: Negative Situps
exercises.notes: Lower core focus; emphasis on slow negative portion.

exercises.name: Pallof Press
exercises.notes: Resisting twisting (rotary core).

exercises.name: Suitcase Carry
exercises.notes: Resisting spinal lateral bending.

exercises.name: Bird Dog
exercises.notes: Posterior core + scapula stabilisation. Allow no pelvic tilt; keep pelvis locked. Knees raised variation is excellent.

exercises.name: Dead Bugs
exercises.notes: Preferred over bird dogs by trainer note.

exercises.name: Abdominal Bracing & Breathing (Floor)
exercises.notes: Focus on sustained brace with nasal breathing.

exercises.name: Push-Up Plus
exercises.notes: Upper back / scapula stabilisation.

exercises.name: I-T-Y-W Raises (Incline)
exercises.notes: Perform prone (frontal) and sagittal plane variations; Y at ~45°. Thumbs up to encourage external rotation. Start with 1–2 kg on ~30° incline bench. 'A' variation also possible.

exercises.name: I-T-Y-W Raises (Sagittal/Transverse plane)
exercises.notes: Short demo of sagittal plane variation.

exercises.name: Seated Dumbbell External Rotation
exercises.notes: Rotator cuff / rear delt focus.

exercises.name: Prone External Rotation (Elbows Supported)
exercises.notes: Harder without a bench; elbows supported on a block.

exercises.name: Side-Lying Shoulder External Rotation
exercises.notes: Likely biases teres minor more; better with externally rotated wrist.

exercises.name: Seated Rear Delt Fly
exercises.notes: Can kneel and hinge forward for added core stability. Focus on external rotation; bench support feels better.

exercises.name: Rear Delt Row (Wide-Grip)
exercises.notes: Use lat pulldown attachment; wide grip; elbows ~45°.

exercises.name: Hip Flexor Stretch
exercises.notes: Recommended before glute work.

exercises.name: Glute Bridge
exercises.notes: Lead with posterior pelvic tilt and drive up from there; keep core braced. Maintain neutral/posterior tilt while breathing.

exercises.name: Single-Leg Glute Bridge
exercises.notes: Easier to get good glute engagement after soft-tissue work on medial knee area if tight.

exercises.name: Hip Thrust
exercises.notes: Move feet farther out to bias glutes over quads.

exercises.name: Lateral Bunkies (Isometric)
exercises.notes: Hold body completely in line; hits many stabilisers.

exercises.name: Banded step outs
exercises.notes: Tap for out to side with band around ankles, just like in the pilates class

exercises.name: Posterior Bunkies (Isometric)
exercises.notes: Posterior tilt cue throughout.

exercises.name: Copenhagen Plank (potentially with short lever)
exercises.notes: If medial knee pain occurs, use short-lever variation.

exercises.name: Lateral Bunkies (Bent-Leg on Small Stand)
exercises.notes: Great for targeting glute medius; test knee valgus control.

exercises.name: Banded Fire Hydrant / Lateral Step-Down
exercises.notes: Knee-valgus-specific drill.

exercises.name: Deadlift (DB/BB)
exercises.notes: Dumbbells preferred in notes; RDLs also suggested.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift (DB/BB)
exercises.notes: Focus on hip hinge and hamstring loading.
